text: You walk into a unknown landscape. What do you do first?

options.label: Wander around to see what unexpected tools youâ€™ll find.
Strike up a conversation with someone already building something.
Scan the posted floor plan to plot your route.
Grab scrap materials and start fiddling.
Search for a corner where no one has worked yet.

text: A teammate drops a wild idea. Your instinct is to...

options.label: Explore where it might lead without judging.
Ask who the idea could really help and why.
Anchor it to the project goals and constraints
Prototype a rough version on the spot.
Push it even further into uncharted territory.

text: Your favourite tool in a workshop is..

options.label: A whiteboard to roam free with thoughts.
Sticky-notes filled with user quotes
A canvas template that lays out the problem.
A box of random craft supplies for rapid hacks.
VR goggles to visualise future possibilities.

text: Faced with contradictory user data, you...

options.label: Dive back in to uncover hidden patterns.
Sit down with users and listen longer.
Re-frame the problem from a higher altitude.
Run a quick test to see which data holds.
Ask what no one else is willing to question.

text: Pick a travel souvenir that mirrors your work style.

options.label: A quirky trinket discovered off-route.
A heartfelt story recorded from a local.
A precisely annotated transit map.
A gadget you hacked together on the trip.
A limited-edition piece no one else found.
